intro.name: Paulo Amaral
intro.title: Software Engineer
summary: Adaptable Software Engineer with a strong emphasis on security, proficient in a range of technologies including JavaScript, TypeScript, React JS, React Native, and Node JS.
I bring a security-focused approach to all aspects of software development, ensuring robust and secure solutions.
Experienced in collaborative teamwork, I excel in both independent and remote work settings and am committed to innovation, mentorship, and delivering impactful solutions.

experiences.description: Prezzee is a global digital gifting platform known for its innovative approach to e-commerce and personalized gift card solutions. As a MarTech Engineer, I collaborate with a global and diverse customer base to elevate their experience with our platform, specializing in MarTech tools such as Segment CDP, HubSpot CRM, and Google Analytics. I own critical SaaS integrations and work closely with the Marketing, Data, and Product teams to drive MarTech innovation and enhance customer engagement.

The City of Casey is a growing municipality in Melbourne's southeast, known for its diverse community and focus on sustainable development. As a Senior Developer, I created digital solutions to improve community engagement and streamline operations, utilizing Drupal and PHP to build scalable web applications. I also guided junior developers and collaborated with stakeholders to translate business requirements into technical solutions.

Nine Entertainment is a leading Australian media company with radio and television broadcasting holdings. I developed mobile applications for iOS and Android, using modern JavaScript and TypeScript frameworks to create full-stack applications.

Servian is a leading Australian software consulting company. I contributed to projects for clients like ING Bank, Westfield, Myer, and Koala, working on front-end solutions, AI/ML features, and customer data platforms.
As an intern at 10xEvolve, a startup following Pivotal Methodology, I contributed to the development of the company's website, custom email service, and authentication components.

education.description: This program focuses on advanced computer science concepts, including software development, data structures, algorithms, and artificial intelligence, preparing students for complex problem-solving and leadership roles.
This course provides a comprehensive introduction to security engineering principles and practices for secure systems.
Completed foundational courses in web development, programming, database systems, and software engineering, achieving six High Distinctions and two Distinctions.
Intensive bootcamp focused on acquiring web development and problem-solving skills.

personalSkills: Mentorship skills, actively supporting professional development of junior colleagues
